articles.description: Manly will limp into the latest installment of their famous rivalry with Cronulla after injuries to key men Tom Trbojevic and Dylan Walker.
articles.content:

articles.title: NRL 2020: Melbourne Storm v New Zealand Warriors round 7 match preview - NRL.COM
articles.description: Melbourne had a surprise loss to the impressive Panthers last week but the Warriors are in a big hole, making the shock decision to sack coach Steve Kearney despite winning two of four games since the NRL's resumption.
